mapper.insert: insert into User (UsrSn, AccSn, Use_UsrSn, PyiSn, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify) values (#{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useUsrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pyisn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{neednotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update User set AccSn = #{accsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Use_UsrSn = #{useUsrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PyiSn = #{pyisn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrName = #{usrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrCode = #{usrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrUrl = #{usrurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsOrg = #{isorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NeedNotify = #{neednotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UsrSn, AccSn, Use_UsrSn, PyiSn, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify from User where UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select UsrSn, AccSn, Use_UsrSn, PyiSn, UsrName, UsrCode, UsrUrl, IsOrg, Email, Passwd, NeedNotify from User
